name: Time Wizard (WoxelGames)
description:
27th GM48 (Ranked 21/77) Theme: Countdown

This game was an entry for the 27th GM48. 

View original submission here: https://gm48.net/game/924/time-wizard

The game uploaded here, is the exact same as the one on the gm48 page.

Story

In Time Wizard, you as a young Wizard, found a dungeon that may have something interesting inside, but as you enter it you get cursed by the evil Time Wizard!

You only have 7.5 minutes before the curse will end your journey and to top it all off, everything you do will cost you time!

Will you be able to defeat the Time Wizard?

There's only one way to find out!

Controls WASDMovingEInteractSpaceDoge RollMouse AimingLeft ClickShootingFullscreen Walk to the top right corner Credits ProgrammingWinuXGraphicsSwissPick
AudioWinuX
